title: 3 and Out - Niners Over Rams Reaction, Cards Can't Close, Brandon Staley Blows it, Bama/Georgia Preview
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Niners Over Rams Reaction, Cards Can't Close, Brandon Staley Blows it, Bama/Georgia Preview
description:
John reacts to the Niners thrilling comeback win over the Rams after watching the action live at SoFi. He also explains why the Cardinals could be one and done in the postseason, Russell Wilson's future, why Brandon Staley should be unmercifully crushed for costing his team a playoff berth, and previews the Bama/Georgia CFP Title Game. Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
